action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Mechanical Engineering
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Fifteen years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Bachelor
OTHER-SKILLS: Project management
AVAILABILITY: Anytime next month

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No, the recruiter has not been informed about the field of my bachelor.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No.
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No, the recruiter has not been informed about the field of my bachelor.
NA
ME: Please be specific now. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No, the recruiter has not been informed about the field of my bachelor.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No, the recruiter has not been informed about the field of my bachelor.
NA
Answer for BACHELOR invalid after max attempts.
Answer is incorrect.

ANSWER: No, the interviewer has not been informed about my time of industry experience.

ANSWER: No, the interviewer has not been informed about my time of industry experience.

ANSWER: No, the interviewer has not been informed about my time of industry experience.

ANSWER: No, the interviewer has not been informed about my time of industry experience.
NA
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE invalid after max attempts.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No, the recruiter is not aware of my highest education level yet.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No.

ANSWER: No.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter is not aware of my highest education level.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter is not aware of my highest education level.

ME:  Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know about my additional skills.

ME:  What are your additional skills? Please list them.

ASIDE: Project management, leadership, teamwork, problem-solving, communication, and adaptability.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know about my additional skills.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know about my additional skills.

ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know about my additional skills.

Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 4 tries.

ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows when you want to start? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know when I want to start.

Answer is correct.
End probing
Abort: invalid format in probing.
